title: rustc 1.67.0-nightly build core dump

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.67.0-nightly (e75aab045 2022-11-09) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental=[REDACTED] note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [evaluate_obligation] evaluating trait selection obligation `for<'a, 'b, 'c, 'd, 'e, 'f, 'g, 'h, 'i, 'j, 'k> {core::future::ResumeTy, &'a actor_service::money_service::MoneyService, i32, &'b str, f64, &'c aqueue::actor::Actor, static_def::DATABASE, &'d str, core::pin::Pin, anyhow::Error>> + core::marker::Send + 'e)>>, core::pin::Pin, anyhow::Error>> + core::marker::Se nd + 'f)>>, (), core::result::Result, anyhow::Error>, core::ops::control_flow::ControlFlow, core:: option::Option>, core::option::Option, db::tables::table_account_money::account_money, bool, &'g str, db::StoreMoney, core::pin::Pin> + core::marker::Send + 'h)>>, core::pin::Pin> + core::marker::Send + 'i)>>, &'j str, core::pin::Pin> + core::marker::Send + 'k)>>}: core::marker::Send` #1 [typeck] type-checking `actor_service::money_service::::change_money_gift_safe` #2 [typeck_item_bodies] type-checking all item bodies #3 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack thread 'rustc' panicked at 'forcing query with already existing `DepNode` - query-key: Canonical { max_universe: U0, variables: [CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Region(U0) }, CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Region(U0) }, CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Region(U0) }], value: ParamEnvAnd { param_env: ParamEnv { caller_bounds: [Binder(OutlivesPredicate(ReLateBound(DebruijnIndex(1), BoundRegion { var: 0, kind: BrAnon(0, None) }), ReLateBound(DebruijnIndex(1), BoundRegion { var: 1, kind: BrAnon(1, None) })), []), Binder(OutlivesPredicate(ReLateBound(Debr uijnIndex(1), BoundRegion { var: 2, kind: BrAnon(2, None) }), ReLateBound(DebruijnIndex(1), BoundRegion { var: 1, kind: BrAnon(1, None) })), []), Binder(OutlivesPredicate(aqueue::Actor, ReLateBound(DebruijnIndex(1), BoundRegion { var: 1, kind: BrAnon(1, None) })), [])], reveal: UserFacing, constness: NotConst }, value: Binder(TraitPredicate( {std::future::ResumeTy, &'a acto r_service::money_service::MoneyService, i32, &'b str, &'c aqueue::Actor, static_def::DATABASE, &'d str, std::pin::Pin, a nyhow::Error>> + std::marker::Send + 'e)>>, std::pin::Pin, anyhow::Error>> + std::marker::Send + 'f)>>, (), bool, &'g str, std::pin::Pi n> + std::marker::Send + 'h)>>, std::pin::Pin> + std::marker::Send + 'i)>>} as std::marker::Send>, polarity:Positive), []) } } -
